official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the third week in May of each year as National High School Band Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the third week in May of each year as "National High School Bank Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the third week in May of each year as National High School Band Week.
